page.title: 06Farming in Cheshire 3
page.content:
The farm is 240 acres and the herd replacement are reared. The areage number of calves for the herd each year is 50. Home mixed - dairy ration is fed in the winter with compounder,s feed used during the summer. The farm is run by three brothers who work appoximately 180 hrs per week. Implements used on the farm include a baler, plough, manure -spreader, slurrly-spreader, potato planter, potato -harvester, silage-trailer and a buck -rake.
Arable Farming at Dairy House Farm. _____________________________________- At Dairy House Farm we have the cow kennels for the heifers to live in during the winter.Oil seed rape is stored in a big five-bay shed this year, usually this is used to keep machinery in. The silage is stored
